local_intent: Ensure bread is visible or scan, detect and align, push bread 0.15m at 90 degrees, verify visibility, then retreat safely.
assumptions: Bread remains on tabletop and push is feasible without lifting
Workspace ahead of bread is clear for a short push
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: visibility check with fallback scan, detection, precise approach, push action, verification of visibility, and retreat.
